Stay informed about the latest developments, achievements, and milestones from our CubeSat project.
July 12, 2024

Successful Integration of Communication Subsystem

The Communications team has successfully integrated and tested the radio communication subsystem with the satellite's main computer.

June 3, 2024

CubeSat Team Wins Innovation Award

Our student team has been recognized with the University Innovation Award for their work on the novel attitude control system for our CubeSat.

New Partnership with Aerospace Industry Leader

We are excited to announce a new partnership with Aerospace Engineering Corporation to support our CubeSat development and testing.

April 22, 2024

International Conference on Small Satellites Features UMA Research

Our research team presented their innovative approach to CubeSat power management at this year's International Conference on Small Satellites.

February 5, 2024

Engineering Students Complete Satellite Prototype

A team of undergraduate and graduate students has successfully completed the first prototype of our CubeSat's structure subsystem.

November 10, 2023

University of Málaga Secures Funding for CubeSat Project

The European Space Agency has approved funding for our CubeSat project, marking a significant milestone in our space research initiatives.

UMA CubeSat Project

Advancing space technology education and research through the development of CubeSats at the University of Málaga.
